storyInfo: Vigna is in a hurry to complete her mission so she can make it to a concert on time. Things don't always go in her favor, though, and she is faced with a dilemma...

attributes.content: Outta the way! Outta the way!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Stop right there! Give it up and let me take you down!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Hey, Vigna, calm down! Don't go out ahead!
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: What is she so worked up for today?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: What, you haven't heard? There's some rock band putting on a concert at the city we're stopped next to. Vigna's been looking forward to it for days.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Well, alright. No wonder.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Right? Anyway, let's go after her. Wouldn't want her to run into any trouble.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Hey, Vigna? I know you're excited about that concert, but try to calm down a bit.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Oh, right. My bad.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: It's fine. I'm not yelling at you or anything, just a friendly reminder.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: That's right. You did a great job. You were a little worked up, but your judgment is just as great as always. You did everything you were meant to do. You've grown up, Vigna.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Hehe, I've been training every single day, y'know!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Haha, that's terrific. I wasn't nearly as industrious when I was your age.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Seeing as you're so excited today, I'm guessing the concert's something to look forward to?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Yeah, I love this band!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: And, I mean, it's not always there's a concert right when we're stopped next to a city!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: True that.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Besides, going to rock concerts in person is like a whole different experience from listening to a CD! You guys should come, too!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Haha, I'll pass. Rock 'n' roll is a bit too loud for my ears.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: More or less the same for me, but we'll do what it takes to make sure you get to that concert tonight.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: That's right!
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Tsk, these bastards know how to ambush, huh?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: With a pack this big, my guess is these beasts have a leader or something.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: I think so too, but it's probably not in this group we're chasing. We would've found it already if it was.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: What should we do? Take a look around this area?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Last one!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Okay, that should be it, right?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Haha. Yeah, let's call it a day here.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: We have all these teams out here bringing their numbers down. Even if we don't get the pack leader today, it'll be some time before they can kick up a fuss again.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Haha, you're right about that. Maybe they never had a leader in the first place.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Hey, Vigna, you gonna make it to that concert of yours in time?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: It's 2:10 right now. Hm, we'll need to head back to the ship for debriefing, and that's going to take about an hour, then it'll take another hour to get to town. The concert starts at five.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Yeah, I'll make it!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Perfect. Let's head back and report.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: We're home!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Good work.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Where's everyone else?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: All the other teams have already finished their assignments. You guys are the last team back.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Alright, so that's a wrap, right?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Well, it is, but...
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Well, here's the deal.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: When Team C was chasing away the beasts, they were attacked by what they thought was the pack leader. There were a lot of them, too, so the team decided to retreat.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: See? I told you.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: What are you so cocky about? I knew this was going to happen too!
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Our contract with the city government stipulates that we have to eliminate the threat of the beasts that's keeping their residents locked down.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: So you mean we have to go back and take care of this threat once and for all?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: That's right. Of course, because of the change in plans, we're reorganizing the mission roster. You don't have to participate if you don't want to.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Well, how can we possibly back out after you told us all that?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: That's right. We'll see it through, but well...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Vigna, you still have your concert, right? Just go. Leave this to the rest of us.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Huh? Concert?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Yeah... It's starting in a few hours.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: I see. You should get going, then. Don't worry about us.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I can't do that...
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: I'm going on this mission too.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Don't worry about us. This is nothing too tough. The beasts have a leader, that's all. We can handle it ourselves.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: That's right. Didn't you say you love this band? Just leave it to us and enjoy the concert.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: But...!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Vigna, I'm glad you're worried about us, but you really don't have to. You completed your mission already, so just take it easy and enjoy the concert.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Are y'all ready to rock?!
attributes.name: Main Vocalist

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Audience

attributes.content: Let's rock this place up all night!
attributes.name: Main Vocalist

attributes.content: Ohh!!!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Man, a concert is totally different in person!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: I really should've dragged them here with me.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: But they...
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Haha, I'll pass. Rock 'n' roll is a bit too loud for my ears.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: More or less the same for me, but we'll do what it takes to make sure you get to that concert tonight.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Hey, Vigna, you gonna make it to that concert of yours in time?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Screw it...
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Hey, what was that for?!
attributes.name: Audience Member A

attributes.content: Watch it, cupcake! What are you even doing, going that way?!
attributes.name: Audience Member B

attributes.content: Excuse me! Sorry, coming through!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: My popcorn!
attributes.name: Audience Member C

attributes.content: Whoa, sorry!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Huh? Vigna, why are you back so early?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Didn't you say the concert was going to last all night?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Where are they?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Who's 'they?'
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: The guys I was on the mission with this afternoon!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Gotta hand it to them. These beasts are crafty.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Yeah, looks like they're hiding now that they know we're a threat.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Well, no wonder they managed to keep this ruckus up for so long.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: So what should we do? Think we should talk to the other teams and head back to ask for a few extra pairs of hands?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Let's just keep looking.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: We'd be making fools of ourselves going back for help after we said all that in front of Vigna.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Eh, speaking of which, I really mean it. She's such a sweet young lady.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: I've never seen a Sarkaz so full of energy.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Woah, you got a problem with Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Hey, don't get the wrong idea. I've been with Rhodes Island for so long, I've got nothing against the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: I might have something against you, though.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: You could really use a beating sometimes, you know that?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Alright, alright. Whatever. My bad.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm pretty fond of Vigna too. Not only did she want to bring us to that concert, she was gonna miss it just to come with us on this job...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: She's not only full of energy. She's got a sense of responsibility. Not a lot of kids these days are like that.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: That's why old folks like us are fighting, so that kids like her can do what they want to do. So let's cut the chatter and get back to work.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Heh, feels like you've been stealing the words right out of my mouth the whole night.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Hm? There's movement, nine o'clock.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Sounds like they're running. Two of them... like one chasing the other...
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Another squad, maybe?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Let's go take a look.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Tsk, I thought it came this way. Where did it go?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: I don't see anyone else. What a pain.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Hey, Vigna, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Huh? There you are!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: We heard movement over here and figured we'd come check.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: I thought you went to that concert of yours?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: I just couldn't leave you, so I came back.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: You're kidding. That's a whole lotta money down the drain!
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Hey, what'd you kick my butt for?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Watch your mouth. That's no way to talk.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Vigna, you sure about this?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Don't worry, I talked to Logistics already. I figured missions are more important than concerts.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Alright, stick with us, then. We make a good team.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: By the way, what's that you're carrying on your back?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Oh, this is my guitar. I brought it with me since I was going to get it signed. I didn't have time to put it away before coming out here.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Alright, enough. See if you can follow their tracks.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Why do I have to do it?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: With how ungrateful you were? You better be happy that's all I'm asking from you.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Alright, alright, fine.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Vigna, let's go. Let's try to take this whole pack down tonight.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: This way. I found their nest!
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Signal the other squads. We'll attack together.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: I'll do it!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: *Howls*!!!
attributes.name: Pack Leader

attributes.content: Take this!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: *Whimpers*...
attributes.name: Pack Leader

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Beautiful work, Vigna.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Now that should actually be a wrap. Let's take a break. After that, we'll search the area before heading back.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Alright. Vigna, you too. Get some rest.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Why are you taking your guitar out?
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Hehe, I said I wanted to take you to the concert, no?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: The concert isn't happening, but I can play their songs for you.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Huh? Well, sounds like a plan.
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator A

attributes.content: Haha, let's get the other guys here, then. Our in-house rocker, Vigna, is putting on her debut concert tonight!
attributes.name: Vanguard Operator B

attributes.content: Hehe. Y'all ready?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Let's rock this place up all night!
attributes.name: Vigna
